DataElement.preferredName: Person Family Medical History Myocardial Infarction Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A human being._A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives. A patient's family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions._Gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area, as in coronary thrombosis._Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Family Medical History Myocardial Infarction
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives. A patient's family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions._Gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area, as in coronary thrombosis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being.:Chronological record of health and disease events of family members and ancestors. (WEBS84)

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives. A patient's family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area. (Dorland, 27th ed)

Concepts.definition: Gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area, as in coronary thrombosis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did your mother, father, full
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did your mother, father, full-blooded sisters, full-blooded brothers, daughters, or sons ever have a heart attack or myocardial infarction?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has anyone in your immediate family (biological mother, father, brothers, sisters) had a heart attack before the age of 55?
